name: Music_4886.wav
keywords: ['folk song', 'acoustic song', 'harmonica', 'no voices', 'no other instruments', 'instrumental', 'no percussion', 'sad melody', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This folk song features a harmonica playing the main melody. The harmonica plays three descending notes. This is followed by a double stop being played a total of nine times in groupings of two, three, three and one time. Then it plays a higher note going down a descending scale of two more notes. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar strumming chords. The mood of this song is sad. This song can be played at a house party.
